00040 #ifndef WIN32
00041 #define FALSE 0
00042 #define TRUE 1
00043 void CopyFile(const char *in, const char *out, bool foo) {
00044         std::ifstream ins(in);
00045         std::ofstream outs(out);
00046         outs << ins.rdbuf();
00047         ins.close();
00048         outs.close();
00049 }
00050 #endif

00062 void CHPFileConverterTest::test_ConvertFile_to_Calvin()
00063 {
00064         const char *cfile = "../data/Calvin-stat.CHP";
00065         const char *xfile = "../data/XDA-stat.CHP";
00066         //const char *origcfile = "../data/orig-Calvin-stat.CHP";
00067         const char *origxfile = "../data/orig-XDA-stat.CHP";
00068         const char *infile = "../data/testCalvin.CHP";
00069         const char *libPath = "../data/";
00070         ConverterRemoveFile(cfile);
00071         ConverterRemoveFile(xfile);
00072         ConverterRemoveFile(infile);
00073         CopyFile(origxfile, infile, FALSE);
00074         CHPFileConverter c;
00075 
00076         ConverterMoveFile("../data/HG-U133A.CDF", "../data/HG-U133A.CDF.txt");
00077         ConverterMoveFile("../data/HG-U133A.PSI", "../data/HG-U133A.PSI.txt");
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c.ConvertFile(infile, libPath, Calvin_Version1) == false);
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c.ErrorCode() == UnableToLoadProbeSetNames);
00080 
00081         ConverterMoveFile("../data/HG-U133A.CDF.txt", "../data/HG-U133A.CDF");
00082         ConverterMoveFile("../data/HG-U133A.PSI.txt", "../data/HG-U133A.PSI");
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c.ConvertFile(infile, libPath, Calvin_Version1) == true);
00084 
00085 }
00086 
00087 void CHPFileConverterTest::test_Convert_Mas5_File_to_Calvin()
00088 {
00089         const char *bakFile = "../data/mas5/test3/Test3_Exp2.CHP.bak";
00090         const char *inFile = "../data/mas5/test3/Test3_Exp2.CHP";
00091         const char *libPath = "../data/mas5/test3/library/";
00092         const char *celFile = "../data/mas5/test3/Test3_Exp2.CEL";
00093         //const char *maskPath = "../data/maskPath";
00094         CHPFileConverter c;
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c.ConvertFile(inFile, libPath, celFile, NULL, Calvin_Version1, false));
00096         
00097         CHPFileReader* reader = new CHPFileReader();
00098         string file(inFile);
00099         reader->SetFilename(file);
00100         CHPData* data = new CHPData();
00101         reader->Read(*data);
00102 
00103         int32_t bgCnt = data->GetBackgroundZoneCnt();
00104         CHPBackgroundZoneVector zones;
00105         data->GetBackgroundZones(0, bgCnt, zones);
00106         size_t zoneCnt = zones.size();
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zoneCnt == 16);
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[0].GetCenterX() == 16);
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[0].GetBackground(), 195.582, .001);
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[1].GetCenterX() == 48);// && zones[1].GetCenterX() == 16);
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[1].GetBackground(), 180.391, .001);
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[2].GetCenterX() == 80);// && zones[2].GetCenterX() == 16);
00113         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[2].GetBackground(), 174.345, .001);
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[3].GetCenterX() == 112);// && zones[3].GetCenterX() == 16);
00115         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[3].GetBackground(), 187.06, .001);
00116         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[4].GetCenterX() == 16);// && zones[3].GetCenterX() == 16);
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[4].GetBackground(), 201.033, .001);
00118         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[5].GetCenterX() == 48);// && zones[3].GetCenterX() == 16);
00119         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[5].GetBackground(), 197.856, .001);
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[6].GetCenterX() == 80);// && zones[3].GetCenterX() == 16);
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[6].GetBackground(), 196.96, .001);
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[7].GetCenterX() == 112);// && zones[3].GetCenterX() == 16);
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[7].GetBackground(), 206.867, .001);
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[8].GetCenterX() == 16);// && zones[3].GetCenterX() == 16);
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[8].GetBackground(), 235.307, .001);
00126         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[9].GetCenterX() == 48);// && zones[3].GetCenterX() == 16);
00127         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[9].GetBackground(), 236.162, .001);
00128         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[10].GetCenterX() == 80);// && zones[3].GetCenterX() == 16);
00129         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[10].GetBackground(), 232.188, .001);
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[11].GetCenterX() == 112);// && zones[3].GetCenterX() == 16);
00131         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[11].GetBackground(), 241.533, .001);
00132         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[12].GetCenterX() == 16);// && zones[3].GetCenterX() == 16);
00133         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[12].GetBackground(), 235.535, .001);
00134         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[13].GetCenterX() == 48);// && zones[3].GetCenterX() == 16);
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[13].GetBackground(), 235.582, .001);
00136         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[14].GetCenterX() == 80);// && zones[3].GetCenterX() == 16);
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[14].GetBackground(), 237.438, .001);
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(zones[15].GetCenterX() == 112);// && zones[3].GetCenterX() == 16);
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(zones[15].GetBackground(), 244.48, .001);
00140 
00141         delete data;
00142         delete reader;
00143         ConverterMoveFile(bakFile, inFile, true);
00144 }

00146 void CHPFileConverterTest::test_ConvertFile_to_XDA()
00147 {
00148         const char *cfile = "../data/Calvin-stat.CHP";
00149         const char *xfile = "../data/XDA-stat.CHP";
00150         const char *origcfile = "../data/orig-Calvin-stat.CHP";
00151         //const char *origxfile = "../data/orig-XDA-stat.CHP";
00152         const char *infile = "../data/testXDA.CHP";
00153         const char *libPath = "../data/";
00154         ConverterRemoveFile(cfile);
00155         ConverterRemoveFile(xfile);
00156         ConverterRemoveFile(infile);
00157         CopyFile(origcfile, infile, FALSE);
00158         CHPFileConverter c;
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c.ConvertFile(infile, libPath, GCOS_XDA_Version) == true);
00160 }

00162 void CHPFileConverterTest::test_ConvertFile_fail_to_open_file()
00163 {
00164         CHPFileConverter c;
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c.ConvertFile("../data/no_file", "./", GCOS_XDA_Version) == false);
00166         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c.ErrorCode() == FileDoesNotExist);
00167 
00168         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c.ConvertFile("../data/invalid_file", "../data/", GCOS_XDA_Version) == false);
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c.ErrorCode() == InvalidChpFileFormat);
00170 }

00172 void CHPFileConverterTest::test_ConvertFile_already_in_format()
00173 {
00174         const char *cfile = "../data/Calvin-stat.CHP";
00175         const char *xfile = "../data/XDA-stat.CHP";
00176         const char *origcfile = "../data/orig-Calvin-stat.CHP";
00177         const char *origxfile = "../data/orig-XDA-stat.CHP";
00178         const char *infile = "../data/test.CHP";
00179         const char *libPath = "../data/";
00180         ConverterRemoveFile(cfile);
00181         ConverterRemoveFile(xfile);
00182         ConverterRemoveFile(infile);
00183         CopyFile(origxfile, infile, FALSE);
00184 
00185         CHPFileConverter c;
00186         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c.ConvertFile(infile, libPath, GCOS_XDA_Version) == true);
00187 
00188         ConverterRemoveFile(infile);
00189         CopyFile(origcfile, infile, FALSE);
00190 
00191         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(c.ConvertFile(infile, libPath, Calvin_Version1) == true);
00192 }
